Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
Handles data access operations for appointment data.

    • selectUpcomingAppointmentsForCurrentUser

      public static List<Appointment> selectUpcomingAppointmentsForCurrentUser()
      Gets all appointments starting within the next 15 minutes for the currently logged-in user.

      This method calculates the current local time and then identifies appointments scheduled to start between the current time and 15 minutes from now. It then filters these appointments to only include ones where the User_Name matches the current user. The result is a list of such appointments from the client_schedule.appointments table.

      Returns:
      A list of all appointment objects starting in the next 15 minutes for the currently logged-in user.

    • selectAppointmentsByContactId

      public static List<Appointment> selectAppointmentsByContactId(int contactId)
      Gets all appointments for a given contact from the appointments table.
      Parameters:
      contactId - The ID of the contact.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointment objects for the specified contact.

    • selectAppointmentsWithRangeConflictForCustomerID

      public static List<Appointment> selectAppointmentsWithRangeConflictForCustomerID(int customerId, LocalDateTime desiredStartDateTime, LocalDateTime desiredEndDateTime)
      Gets the list of appointments that conflict with a desired time range for a given customer. Checks for overlapping appointments based on start and end times using SQL queries.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the customer id that the user entered
      desiredStartDateTime - the start date and time that the user entered
      desiredEndDateTime - the end date and time that the user entered
      Returns:
      a list of conflicting appointments

    • createAppointmentFromResultSet

      private static Appointment createAppointmentFromResultSet(ResultSet resultSet) throws SQLException
      Extracts appointment details from the ResultSet and creates an Appointment object.
      Parameters:
      resultSet - A set of appointment data
      Returns:
      The Appointment object created from the ResultSet.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL error occurs during data extraction.
